description.value:
You scramble a creature's mental faculties and sensory input. The target must attempt a Will saving throw. Regardless of the result of that save, the target is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. Warp mind's effects happen instantly, so @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] and other effects that counteract spells can't counteract them. However, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wish] rituals and abilities that can remove non-magical effects can still counteract the effects.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target spends the first action on its next turn with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] condition.

Failure The target is Confused for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is Confused permanently.
